title: Can a collagen drink return your skin to youthfulness? I drank one every day for two months to find out...
text:
Shhh … I don’t drink nearly as much water as I’m supposed to. I just can’t be bothered with all those trips to the loo. And guess what else? I grew up in Australia, at a time when sunscreen use wasn't as militant as it is now. Put those two together and I’m pretty sure that I deserve to look like a paper bag that’s been used for a week’s worth of packed lunches.

But who wants to look like that?

No one, if you judge by the facts that a) sales of foundation containing SPF 50 rose by 114 per cent in the first seven months of this year; and b) sales of anti-oxidant, skin-replenishing avocado soared by £29.8million in 2017.
